projects.name: LGDS
projects.text: Dans le cadre d'un projet d'étude nous avons réaliser une applications pour la coopérative Les Grains de sel, cette application permet de gerer les évenements qu'organise la coopérative, cete application utilise Django, et Odoo.

projects.name: Grapher
projects.text: This software is a grapher which reads a mathematical function which with a lexical and synthaxical interpreter displays the graph of the function, this application uses C & OpenGL

projects.name: Labyrinthe
projects.text: this program is the video game adaptation of the board game Labyrinth, this game is displayed directly on the console, this game uses the C

projects.name: portfoliov1
projects.text: Cette application est la première version de mon portfolio, elle utilise Vue

projects.name: portfoliov2
projects.text: This App is the portfolio That your on right now, it use React & Next

projects.name: PathFinder
projects.text: This software is a sandbox for the A* pathfinding algorithme, This software isusing Python & Pygame

projects.name: Image Similarity Search
projects.text: This software is able to search in a data base the closest image from a query depending is color spectrum, it can do Brute search and also use different technique to speed up the process such as kd Trees and LSH, it use Python & MatplotLib

projects.name: Tetris Python remake
projects.text: This Game is a remake of the famous tetris Game, it use Python & Pygame

projects.name: prototype GPRD
projects.text: During my L3 internship in the laboratories Asepta I have developped a prototype of a DMS, it has many useful features for saving cosmetic and chemical recipe, it use PHP & MySQL
